data.title: Famous Birthdays on March 26
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays for the 26th of March. See which celebrities, historical figures, scientists and criminals were born on March 26.
data.text:
Birthdays 1 - 200 of 261

Vasili III of Russia, Great Prince of Moscow (1505-33), son of Ivan III (d. 1533)
